name: NETXP LINUX Virtualization - Virt-Manager usage
description: Monitors the execution of Virt-Manager (virt-manager), providing visibility into virtualization-related activities on the system. Detection of Virt-Manager activities helps in monitoring virtualization operations and potential security risks.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "virt-manager" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
